website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not a great watch for men who are rough on accessories, it's worth considering for those who have their heart set on a specific wood color since it comes in 4 different wood options.
pros: Offers variety, as it comes in red sandalwood, zebra wood, maplewood, and ebony wood
cons: The watch strap is delicate, and it's challenging to remove and replace the pins to adjust it
Occasional reports of hands falling off the mechanism

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch band a bit big tho
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Was surprised to see the band was wood a well. Band was a bit big but I managed to get a link off to make it fit better. Broke one of the side links on accident 😢 But it fits better now. 😀 If you get one you will enjoy it but I'd recommend getting a professional to make the band smaller to fit, unless you have a holder for the band to make it easier to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Blackjack

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN: THE PINS AND LINKS ARE FAULTY
customer_reviews.text: This watch is cheaply made. It looks good, but to the touch it’s the cheapest material. On top of that, the pins that hold the watch together when adjusted continually fall out while wearing the watch. I bought this for my boyfriend and within the first day wearing it, the pins fell out and the watch was gone and had fallen completely apart. On top of that, the pins that weren’t even adjusted began to fall out until the links were completely in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Witt

customer_reviews.title: UGHGHGHGGHGH!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this so much. I suck a returning stuff. When you get this you need to remove and add wooden blocks on the "strap" to make it longer or short/ I guess it makes sense since its made of wood. Assembling the product was such hard work, when I finally assembled it, one of the pins fell out and its fell clean off. I really wanted to like this product. Now it sits in my pile of regret.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G.

customer_reviews.title: Watch was Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing quite as frustrating as getting something new delivered only for it to be DOA. That's what I got, a dead watch. The battery is in it, could it be dead? Who knows at this point. I live in a small town and don't have many options when it comes to watch batteries. I was going to order another one of these if I liked this one but I guess one dead watch is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Red's Driver

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with this garbage. Took a link out to fit my wrist and now the metal pieces won't stay in. Took it to a jeweler and they recommended returning it. Of course, this company has a short return period and won't take it back. Junk junk junk!
customer_reviews.author: ALAN E SAUNDERS

customer_reviews.title: Watch Design, Functionality, and Customer Service are A+++
customer_reviews.text: The watch is charming and handsome. The stain on the wood is an incredible color that gives this watch a unique appearance. It has a weight to it that is just right and the face is large without being ostentatious. GBLifeTech was an absolutely amazing seller. The watch band initially did not fit my boyfriend's wrist (he is 6'5" with a very large build) I inquired where I could buy additional links to expand the length of the band. They got back to me immediately and said they would ship them to me FOR FREE. Amazing service, you cannot go wrong with this watch or this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly light and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Like the looks of it on the picture and was very enthused to purchase for my "dress-up-look" :-) To my great surprise the real thing looks a lot better then the picture! Feels very good on my wrist and extremely light weight! I had to take 2 links out for me, and unlike some ppl, did not have any trouble doing it (and without taking the bracelet completely off the watch). Nothing broken and time/date adjusted just fine. At this point I can tell that I absolutely love these watch at this point! Only time will tell more! (pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: great watch. Ooops premature it broke and so did my heart
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was a great watch from my previous post...however two weeks later it fell apart. The band isn't constructed all that well. But I do love it, I hope someone around my town can repair it. great watch...I really like the looks and feel of the wood instead of metal or leather bands, So much more comfortable and lightweight than traditional watches. Let see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: A real conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of timekeeping. It's rich wood grain and light weight are an ideal combination and I get comments on this watch almost every time I wear it. As an Old Fart, I love a good watch and have more than a few. This is my favorite though and I wear it more than any other watch in my collection, though it's probably the least expensive of them all. It's not for diving and I recommend you take it off before washing your hands. The wood will dry out if exposed to too much water. But if it does, just give it a quick once over with Olde English. Good as new. Great watch, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gnick

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and looks great
customer_reviews.text: We just recieved this for my guy and he LOVES it. Its light weight and didn't pinch like other watches do. Also it didnt pull any hairs out. I checked out the company's website and they reccomend lemon oil or tung oil for maintenance so its nice to know we dont have to get special products to maintain it. So far we are really happy with it. The only issue i have is navigating the website to register the watch but that could also be user error since we are using our phones.
customer_reviews.author: Thatkidsmom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch, well made!
customer_reviews.text: This watch does not disappoint. It's worth every penny and it's more environmentally conscious. The wood grain is shiney with nice tiger stripes, very light wood. The dial and mechanics work well and the timekeeping is accurate. The metal clasp is secure and overall no complaints! If you found this review helpful please vote as such.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald D. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite watches, I have actually owned 3 of these (1 of which I lost and the other was stolen) and I have gotten nothing but compliments on this watch. After about 2 years the battery finally went out, but its easy access to the battery that can be replaced. Like any watch the band was a bit big but you can get watch repair kits from Amazon for pretty cheap and adjust the watch yourself to the size desired.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Within a day out of the box the internal second hand fell apart and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Colin S. Crandall

customer_reviews.title: The only complaint I have is the tool it comes with is terrible. I would recommend getting a separate tool if ...
customer_reviews.text: I am always getting compliments on this watch whenever I wear it out. A lot of people notice it and ask about it and I simply respond "cheap on Amazon". The only complaint I have is the tool it comes with is terrible. I would recommend getting a separate tool if you have smaller wrists. Other than that this watch is amazing. My first one survived numerous mountain biking and bmx trips. It only broke when I was playing combat archery and the bow snapped onto it and broke the bracelet. The watch still ticked. Great overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks amazing! Many people have asked me about it and complimented me on how cool it is! It's very lightweight, but feels strong. The only thing I would like to warn people about: When you take out a link and go to put the pin back in, there is a little silver piece that holds the pin in. Don't lose that piece! I lost one of them. Not a big deal because I took two links out, but still... Keep an eye on those. Other than that, The watch is awesome! This is actually the second one I bought. The first I had sent to my Dad for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: tshai

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is going to LOVE this watch! I purchased for Christmas along with other things and I can't wait for him to open!!! When he said he wanted a wooden watch, I had no idea it would look like this and I got it on Cyber Monday for a great price which was even better. It looks very sophisticated! I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: This was a Valentines gift for my boyfriend, he absolutely loved it, however at a family function a few days later, it fell off his wrist because the pin popped out and now it continues to do that so he can’t wear it. Will need to return it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Get the insurance!!!
customer_reviews.text: Edit review: The watch looks great but doesn't work. I gave this to my fiance for his birthday in April and this will be the third time I am sending it to the insurance. Original review: My fiancé loved it! The links were very difficult to get off but he finally got it. Lightweight and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Terryann

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch/Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my grandson who is in college he is a collector of Watchers of course 90% of what I purchased and watches are on Amazon! The quality of the swatch is amazing not to mention how absolutely stunning it looks he gets many compliments on this Watch probably is one of his favorite I highly suggest if you need a gift this is the one to purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH MINOR

customer_reviews.title: get compliments literally every day
customer_reviews.text: i bought this watch for my partner for valentine's day last year. he loves it and it has become his everyday watch. it is super light weight and he literally gets compliments on it - often from strangers - every single day. a friend liked it so much i sent her the link to buy it for her boyfriend. he also loves it and now wears it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: KC-Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this inexpensive, lightweight watch to wear while traveling. The whole point was not to attract attention. Ironically, this watch is so great looking that it attracted attention everywhere we went. Strangers were constantly asking about it and admiring it. Bonus: It also keeps time perfectly. We couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: MairzyD

customer_reviews.title: Wood watch that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wood watch but it doesn't work. Stops for no reason. After 5 weeks stopped for good and second hand fell off. I would like a refund but it has been over 30 days. No more Bewell watches for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets compliments on this watch every time he wears it. It is exactly as described. The watch looks fantastic. It does not look cheap. It comes with all of the links attached, so it's pretty big. The box includes the tool remove the extra links. I have no complaints only compliments. I would repurchse this if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, light on the wrist
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed wearing this watch the past few months. It's not heavy at all and brings a natural feel to any look. I initially had an issue with the stem falling out, but I found that it was unscrewed. Once I screwed it back it securely I've had no issues pulling out the stem or adjusting the time/date with it.
customer_reviews.author: OneLuckySalt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband as an anniversary present. I am not exaggerating, he gets at least one complement a day. Everybody wants to know where he got this watch. It is very light weight and looks great. He has not gotten it wet yet although I would not suggest it. Very snazzy looking though for sure! We have met other people who have paid three times the amount for this exact same watch
customer_reviews.author: Jenem

customer_reviews.title: Stay away Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because I liked it was a wooden watch and most reviews were positive. Well you get what you paid for a $29 piece of junk - poorly made stay away from this item don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Watch is very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I gave one to each of my two sons-in-law. They promised to let me know how much they likes/disliked them after they have a chance to wear them. I'll update my review later with their feedback. Otherwise I gave them basically 3 stars because it have no positive or negative opinions of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! Great conversation piece!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my Zebra Wood watch! For the prive you cannot beat it! I wore it to work today for thw first time and received several nice comments, and people couldnt get over how light it was and that it was made of wood - great conversation starter! I am thoroughly impressed with the quality of the watch and i thought that even the packaging was nice. I have already been looking through more Bewell watches, looking to get a dark wood watch as well!
customer_reviews.author: John Hinz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful. It took us 4 months to be able to wear it, because we didn't have the tool to shorten the links. Found out after hours of trying to remove it that the tool was in the box under a paper inside the lid. After all that work... It doesn't work. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product for the price . I would not recommend wearing it in the rain or washing dishes or any type of work because it is fragile and the wood may get worn. I would not recommend wearing it in the rain or washing dishes or any type of work because it is fragile and the wood may get worn I take it off before I go to bed and I never wear it when I’m working or in the rain . I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.author: LouCityLiquid

customer_reviews.title: Really a very nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch months ago. I have watches costing many times as much, but almost every time I wear this I get compliments. If you're looking for and inexpensive (and easy to wrap) gift this is it. You and the recipient won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Good size, and weighs so little, it's like your not even wearing a watch. I did not have to adjust the band, so it may not be suitable for wrists larger than 8.5 inches. I haven't had it long enough to know how well it holds time. I really like its appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the watch for a couple of days, but I love it! This is the third wood watch I’ve added to my collection. I’m giving the metal ones away. This one is the best low cost one I’ve seen yet. Removing a link to make it fit better was actually fairly easy! It’s comfortable, light, and a great bargain at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lee L.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband and it was broke when he opened it up. I'm very upset.
customer_reviews.author: holly allen

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband is obsessed with wood products, so I got this for him for our anniversary. He absolutely loved the watch! My only gripe would be that I wish it said what type of wood was used in the making of it. He would have loved to know a little more information along those lines.
customer_reviews.author: Enshanted

customer_reviews.title: Links break right off... can't adjust size
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this watch. I experienced what many other reviewers did - trying to adjust the bands breaks the links. Attractive watch but you can't adjust the length without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Chincilla2000

customer_reviews.title: Bewell W086B Mens Watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who wanted an oversized watch and so liked the men's. She loves it. She had a little trouble taking links out but with help they came out just fine. So far no problems with it and it made her happy so it's all good. :)
customer_reviews.author: spacey

customer_reviews.title: Great look doesn’t work longer than 2 to 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I would like to amend my earlier review of this product. In less than I year I have bought 2 of these watches for my husband the first one broke and I thought maybe it was a fluke so I bought him a replacement the replacement stopped working at all!!! So no I’ve wasted all this money on two watches that we absolutely love the look of but the craftsmanship ship was junk. Hopefully I can find the company that makes these so I can let them know they need to improve quality control and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kilgo

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice!!! The watch does not work at all. No one can seem to help us at Amazon support!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASHDOLL80

customer_reviews.title: so nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who is a wood worker and if you have someone in your life like that, you know what a snob they can be about different kinds of wood and craftsmanship....But he loves it! It wears it all the time and always says how much he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend purchasing this watch, unless you have a large wrist.
customer_reviews.text: Instruction state to use inclosed tool to remove pins in order to remove links. This did not work! Instructions for the watch were for another watch. Details on illustration are so small I had to use a magnify glass to see them.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Eye-catching and comfortable timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood tones, lightweight and comfortable on the wrist. Link removal to accommodate a smaller wrist is easy, especially with the tool included with the watch for removing the pin. Take care when re-pinning the band together to make sure the pin clicks into place. Only con - dark numbering on dark wood isn't the easiest to read, depending on the light. If this one shows any kind of long-term durability, I'll happily get another watch from this maker.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Very light and fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and fancy wooden watch! Length can be adjusted and has a screwdriver inside as well. Seems to be made out actual wood, but i don't know how to check it. It matches with formal attires and also for casual. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: samforchew

customer_reviews.title: I love thiswatch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It looks as it does in the picture. Packaging is attractive. Watch is good quality and excellent value for the price. I highly recommend this watch for the watch lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Stops ticking after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this watch twice. I absolutely love way it looks and the lightweight feel. I have gotten many positive comments about it. The one bummer is that both of the watches I bought stopped ticking. Tried new batteries and all. First watch I got a good year out of it, the second one only 4 months or so. I would buy another if I knew it would last
customer_reviews.author: Nick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch to replace an old wooden watch which I liked and this one is by far the best. It is easy to read, very comfortable (less itchy or sticky than many wood watches can be), and I love the overall look. It's not something you'll regret buying
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: the watch was absolutely beautiful - which definitely makes me more butt hurt about ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm late in writing the review, but the pin broke through the thing wood and so my strap came flying off. Days 2 of owning it, I work at a front desk in a hotel so I don't even move much. Other than that, the watch was absolutely beautiful - which definitely makes me more butt hurt about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Christmas, the product looked very nice and wasn’t damaged. The face of the watch looked a little blurry and had some sawdust looking material on it, which I blew off. Watch was working and I recommend this if you’re looking for a nice wooden watch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. It is gorgeous and we'll made. He receives compliments on it every time he wears it, which is every weekend. He's banged it a few times here and there and it has held up well. Removing links was a little difficult but other than that we love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my brother for Xmas and he loved it. It's very sturdy and feels much more expensive than it is. Its definitely a conversation piece and everyone else was very impressed by the creativity of this as a gift rather than a regular watch or sweater.
customer_reviews.author: samanthann92

customer_reviews.title: Must have been an open box return
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and took out the watch which looked nice until upon further inspection I noticed the knob on the stem was missing, the front of the watch had scratches on the glass and also the wristband clasp also had scratches, the band was too tight which leads me to believe this was previously used. Amazon is great with their return policy but I was looking forward to wearing this. I might buy this style again,idk.
customer_reviews.author: wood hacker

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: I liked this watch. I don't wear it anymore because I got a smart watch, but I got tons of compliments on this one. Only giving 4 stars because it swells pretty badly if it gets any moisture on it at all, even sweat (to be expected, because it is wood afterall). Overall a good buy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware it’s fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a great idea for a product yet I used it once and dropped it only to watch it break into a thousand pieces. Wish I returned it for another because I loved how it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Giacomucci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at everything but telling time...
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks and feels great. However the hour hand on mine was mounted incorrect or something, it is like 15 min ahead if the minute hand (pictured, I am requesting a replacement will update my review when it arrives)
customer_reviews.author: John Powers

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Purchased for Christmas, broke after one month. The section that holds the band to the face split on both sides. This is from a flaw in the wood or manufacturing. Not worth the money. Return option expired on January 31st.
customer_reviews.author: Wenzdae

customer_reviews.title: Good and stylish for price
customer_reviews.text: I love the wood, as it's stylish and light on my arm. However, the pins are quite difficult to remove and replace when resizing the band. The instructions are clear and present the process as simple. Regardless, have a hammer, patience, and some skill ready. Otherwise, take it to a watch shop for adjusting. My other frustration is with the lack of alignment between the second hand and the makings on the bevel. For the most part, the watch hands align, nevertheless there are points within each minute that are off. In sum, this watch is worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and masculine. This was an early Christmas present for my husband and he loves it. It keeps perfect time and he can read the date. I would recommend this watch to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: Another favorite. The day after adjusting the link one of the screws fell out while he was at work looking to find a replacement screw as he also fell in love with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalShopper78

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, good quality timekeeping piece, & fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this watch, been wearing it for almost two years, constantly get compliments and it keeps good time. With a cell phone, I no longer need a watch to do anything more than keep time. And, it's so light that I hardly notice it. The next one will have a lighter color wood on the inside to make seeing the hands a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Frizzle

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my husband. He loves to refinish wood furniture, and this is a beautiful conversation piece as well as a useful timepiece. He is enjoying it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tweetybird

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price and kept perfect time. My one complaint it the band is loosening a few months later and I suspect it will break soon. Disappointing, especially when this watch isn't worn daily. Still a fun gift or stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: The packaging the watch came in was very nice and small
customer_reviews.text: The packaging the watch came in was very nice and small... I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriends 30th birthday. He loves watches and I felt like this was very unique and matched his “style” well. It was a hit. He loved the watch, it was very nice and lightweight and it also came with the tool needed for removing links, which was very helpful as my boyfriends wrists were too small for how it was originally set. Link removal was very easy and hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Merritt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful, dark saturated color that we both like
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday. It’s a beautiful, dark saturated color that we both like. We are very pleased with the watch overall. The quality looks much nicer than what I paid and it runs. A bonus is that he likes that it’s very lightweight and not heavy on his wrist. Can’t expect more than that!
customer_reviews.author: Lovey

customer_reviews.title: Stylish watch that is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Father’s Day. Lightweight, easy to read and looks good. Would be a nice additional choice if you like wearing watches. Face is not too big
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: It Just Broke. Feel Apart for Non Reason. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has wanted a wooden watch for a couple years, so I bought it for him for Christmas. It's a gorgeous watch, and he loved it. However, he barely got to wear it a month before it just broke. It wasn't hit on anything, he took very good care of it, and it literally just fell off of his wrist as he was getting into his truck. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dad/husband gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my husband for his birthday to wear to work with his business/casual attire and it looks so good! You could totally dress it up or down. It is also real easy to size yourself. I plan on buying him the other colors that are available.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the picture. When I took the links out added JB weld to the links we where the cavities are blends in and not vissable . Being a $30.00 watch i do not expect it last forevver but epoxy well help add a few years .
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever.
customer_reviews.text: O.m.g. this is the best watch i have ever owned. I just got it but i love that it's so lightweight. The style is impressive. And everyone loves the look!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hutcherson

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: broke after a couple of wears, very flimsy light wood plastic composite
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I work in the fire service. . ( yeah I know, fire fighter with a wood watch. Haha) I bought this cause I work in AZ and we sweat alot, the rubber one just made my wrist Miserable. This watch fixed that problem completely. I absolutely love it. I've gotten some many complaints it's ridiculous!!! I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: robbie cory robinson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and very nicely packaged
customer_reviews.text: A very unique watch. Looks great and very nicely packaged. Adjusting the size was tricky. Links come out easily but putting back together a very tiny piece fell out so that was awkward. So do you resizing at a table to keep all you need!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Dieckmann

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch. Can be a little stubborn when trying to adjust the links but at least I know it's durable and well put together. My husband absolutely loves it..
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kolvoord-Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the watch is pretty low. My dad is a carpenter and this was supposed to be his present. I sent it back without even showing him.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Junker

customer_reviews.title: It broke the second I went to turn the PIN to set the watch that fell apart
customer_reviews.text: when I open the box I was so happy with so beautiful lightweight I thought it was perfect I went to set the watch and set the time and the pin came out hasn't worked so since day one it just fell apart literally in my hand do not buy this product how disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: The watch works very well and looks great! The person I gave this to very much likes it and he wears it quite often. It does get a decent amount of attention from others and, even though I kind of said this already, it is really cool that it is made out of actual wood!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome. This thing is cool. I love the weight of it. It’s like a feather on your wrist. Could be great for someone who doesn’t like wearing watches. Easy to adjust and doesn’t feel cheap, despite the weight. I love it, so far.
customer_reviews.author: misterjc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! This was a gift for my husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! This was a gift for my husband and he LOVED it. Whenever he wears it he gets lots of compliments. It is very lightweight and this he really likes. I wish there had been a card indicating care instructions but I gave him what was on the site I purchased it at.
customer_reviews.author: N. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best wood watches for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best wood watches for the money! I on several Bewell wood watches and hold up and keep time very well. I have a lot of watches some valued at several thousand dollars and my Bewell Wood watches get more compliments than any of the rest of my watches!
customer_reviews.author: Apex

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but finish will not last
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 months ago as an anniversary present for my husband. 5 years is the wood anniversary. My husband loves this watch. Its beautiful BUT unfortunately the finish doesn't hold up under daily regular wear. The date is never right. It looks 10 years old when it's only 3 months old. Its unfortunate. If I knew then what I know now I probably would have thrown a coat of satin polyurethane on the thing the day it came in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a 4 year wedding anniversary gift to my husband and he loved it! Very unique yet not flashy! The watch is very light and smells wonderful like wood. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tanlee

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review for anything I have bought off of Amazon before, but I am going too for this because I am so upset. I bought this watch for husband for our anniversary today. When he first tried to wear it the watch wouldn't work at all, but after a view minutes it did. He wore it for an hour and it completely died. I am debating about returning it and getting my money back. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and beautiful! ! Brought as a gift and it was very well received- It was packaged nicely and I presented it in it's original packaging ( no gift wrapping) as it was so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Budnbutafli43

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the watch as promised and I am pleasantly pleased. It looks very solid for the price and I'm excited to give it to my watch loving husband for Christmas. Packaging was simple, but solid as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband for his birthday because the design is beautiful. He unfortunately was able to wear it once, as the quality of this product is sub-par at best. The pins fell out of it. I recently tried to contact the seller to ask for replacement pins, but the 'window' has past. Was really looking forward to this as a gift, but can say that I will not be a returning customer of Bewell in the foreseeable future, but maybe someday.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Pisano

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light weigh
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch just take it off before going in the pool or taking a shower. It will get condensation under the face of the watch. Lucky it did dissipate
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parker

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! He had to visit 4 different jewelers ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas. He loved it! He had to visit 4 different jewelers to finally find one who could remove a link for him so it would fit his small wrist (don't know why it was so hard to remove when it even included the small tool to remove them for size), but other than that he loves it and has gotten many compliments! Even from the jewelers he showed it to :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Helen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and great quality for the price. Got this as a gift for my fiancé for his birthday, and he wears it all the time now! He’s had it now for 7 months, and wears it almost daily, and it’s still in great condition. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Roecker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend - she loves "boyfriend" style watches and this was perfect! We appreciated the fact that a little tool was included to take out the pins for the links as we needed to make the band a little smaller. It is a very light watch - which makes it seem flimsy, but so far it seems to be of solid quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to re-attach strap after adjusting
customer_reviews.text: Really sad, I was really looking forward to wearing this beautiful watch however I am unable to as the strap pins are beyond terrible. Trying to adjust the strap length is impossible. The simple "snap" you're supposed to be able to hear when you push the pins back together doesn't work so the strap keeps falling apart. Will be returning and looking to buy a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! it's an eye catcher, and is very accurate. It is super lightweight so it feels cheap but its made very well. The links are a pain to remove and reattach but you only have to do that once or twice so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman/landscaper

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 wearings
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the watch. It is very lightweight and stylish. However, it broke after my 2nd time wearing it. I am not very active and I sit at a desk all day. There was nothing strenuous that would cause the strap break so easily.
customer_reviews.author: CliMoh

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece, functional, comfortable - very lightweight. After having it sized though, the pins won't stay in place and the band regularly comes off. I have had it looked at a few times, pins replaced, but same thing continues to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kaay

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, light-weight conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: I had a little difficulty sizing the watch to my carnie-ish sized wrists and ultimately had to have the watch replaced. No hassle whatsoever! The exchange was seamless and didn’t cost a thing. I wear it almost every day, and get complimented on it all the time. Looking forward to purchasing another style soon!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Daboul

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking watch. The band was a little big but i took it to the jewler/ watch place and had 2 links taken out. It fits just right now a little loose but not that loose just how I like it. I highly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch! It's a very different kind of product - the wood feels & looks wonderful, and keeps time very well. Thinking of getting another one - the craftsmanship is marvelous!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I like these watches because they are really lightweight and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these watches because they are really lightweight and my very sensitive skin is OK with wood. They are also very beautiful and look well-designed. Of course, you have to remember that they fear water (because it's wood) and they are much more fragile than metal. The removal of unneeded links might take a while, be careful, but this watch worth it. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marion

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very well made. Easy to adjust the band length. Loved how quickly the watch was shipped. I like the fact that there are different colors to be bought. Will most likely buy more in the future. The only reason I am giving a 4-star review is how many emails I received requesting a review.
customer_reviews.author: Saphira

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but it broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product but it broke very easily while trying to remove a link to fit my wrist. I am very disappointed. Update: I was able to fix it despite one of the wooden links breaking. It is making me think this is a fragile watch though. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! He gets compliments on it all the time. The band is very large so we took it to a watch repair shop and they adjusted it to his size and we haven’t had any issues with It. Only giving four stars because it does get scratched and looks very worn after a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Nice, super nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unique gift for my son. He loved it.. The watch itself looked very sophisticated. Cool and different..
customer_reviews.author: Celena Ramirez

product_meta.title: Bewell W086B Mens Wooden Watch Analog Quartz Lightweight Handmade Wood Wrist Watch
product_meta.description:
Special features: 
Brand: Bewell

Shape of the dial: Round 
Display type: Analog 
Hour formats: 12 Hour

Band material: Wood 
Clasp type: Folding clasp with safety

Band length: 17.8 cm / 7.01 inches (Adjustable) 
Band width: 2.2 cm / 0.87 inches 
Dial diameter: 4.2 cm / 1.65 inches 
Dial thickness: 1 cm / 0.39 inches 
Band thickness:0.5 cm / 0.19 inches 
Product weight: 0.0580 kg 
Package weight: 0.1180 kg

Package size (L x W x H): 7.00 x 7.00 x 7.00 cm / 2.76 x 2.76 x 2.76 inches 

Package Contents: 
1 x Bewell Quartz Men Watch 
1 x 1 x Bewell Watch Box,1x English instructions,1 remove link tool 

Maintenance points of the wood watch: 
1.Try not to get wet or soak in the water in daily life 
2.Wipe the watch at intervals, the color would be more bright 
3.Don't strike or pull the watch too violent 
4.Clean the stains frequently
Wood Watch Introduce: 
Bewell natural wood watch is handmade with 100 % natural wood material without paint,it is very lightweight and comfortable to wear.It is retro unique cool style handmade watch. 

Notice: 
Made of 100% natural wood,there may be some spots on the watch, It is not the quality problem.And also maybe the natural colors of them are slightly different from each other and color difference.

feature_bullets: 【Natural Wood Material】: Made of 100% natural wood from Africa. Each one is hand-crafted,lightweight ,Fashion. Retro and classic.Non-toxic and hypo-allergenic.
【Unique Style】: It is very lightweight you can’t even feel it on your wrist. with a classic wooden strap which is smooth and comfortable to wear
【Main Features】: with Date display at 3 o'clock position, Imported Japan quartz movement, keep the time precise,Battery life is up to 36 months, very durable
【Adjustable Band】: Packing with 1 Links Removing Tools,you can easy to remove the watch band links size to fit your wrist.Carefully Packaged with Watch Box
【Gift Idea】: It is a great gift choice to your beloved ones form Christmas,Thanksgiving day,Hollywood,Wedding,Anniversary, Birthday, Graduation, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, etc
